name: Allison Carr
title: Data Scientist
summary: Detail-oriented professional with extensive experience in manufacturing, farming, and greenhouse management, seeking to leverage analytical and problem-solving skills in a data analyst role. Skilled in process optimization, data-driven decision-making, and performance tracking. Passionate about transforming raw data into actionable insights to drive business improvements.
